subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A visit to the back right corner of the Knicks’ locker room usually provides a glimpse into the team’s state of affairs. Quentin Richardson resides there, dispensing brutal honesty when it is needed most.
snippet: A visit to the back right corner of the Knicks’ locker room usually provides a glimpse into the team’s state of affairs. Quentin Richardson resides there, dispensing brutal honesty when it is needed most.
